attributes.action: To look at the fuel prices
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Can goverment do something about the fuel prices, even though the price of crude oil is falling down every day how come the petrol stations they still have the prices of July when it peaked. The prices were quick to go UP but very very SLOW to coming down . So we need the goverment to act on this right away.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
